faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about our services

items.question: How long does it take to make a smoothie?
items.answer: It only takes 30 seconds to pedal a smoothie, but you can stay and keep riding if you want! It's very fun and very easy for all ages!

items.question: What ingredients do you use?
items.answer: We use natural ingredients like frozen fruits, veggies, and other fresh-tasting options.

items.question: How many people can use a bike at once?
items.answer: Each bike can accommodate one person at a time. However, we encourage participants to queue up and cheer each other on, creating a festive, community atmosphere.

items.question: Do you need electricity?
items.answer: No! That's the beauty of our bikes - they run entirely on human power. We bring our own battery-powered sound equipment if needed.

items.question: What happens if it rains?
items.answer: We can operate indoors if you have suitable space, or we can reschedule the event. We work with you to find the best solution.

items.question: How far in advance should I book?
items.answer: We recommend booking at least 2-3 weeks in advance, especially during peak season (May-September). For large events, 4-6 weeks is preferable.

items.question: Do you offer bilingual services?
items.answer: Absolutely! All of our hosts are bilingual and can conduct the event in French, English, or both languages according to your needs.

items.question: Are there any age restrictions?
items.answer: Our children's bikes are perfect for ages 5-10, and our adult bikes are suitable for ages 10 and up. We have options for all ages and abilities.

items.question: What happens with unused ingredients?
items.answer: As part of our commitment to sustainability, we donate all leftover ingredients to local charities such as Moisson Montreal.

items.question: Can you customize smoothies for our brand?
items.answer: Yes! We can create custom recipes, use your brand colors, and even add your logo to the bikes for corporate events.
